apps.name: AltStore
apps.subtitle: A home for apps that push the boundaries of iOS.
apps.description:
This is the default source for AltStore. You can add additional sources to manage what apps appear in AltStore.

For more info, check out our FAQ: https://faq.altstore.io/patreon/beta-access/sources

This update fixes the "no provisioning profile with the requested identifierâ€¦" error when sideloading or refreshing apps.

â€¢ â€œClear Cacheâ€ button removes non-essential data to free up disk space
â€¢ Sideload more than 3 apps via MacDirtyCow exploit*â€

â€ Visit faq.altstore.io for detailed instructions.

NEW

Lock Screen Widget (iOS 16+)
â€¢ Counts down days until AltStore expires
â€¢ Available in 2 different styles: "icon" and "text"

Error Log
â€¢ View past errors in more detail
â€¢ Tap an error to copy the error message or error code
â€¢ Search for error code directly in AltStore FAQ
â€¢ Access via new "Techy Things" section in settings

iOS Version Compatibility
â€¢ Checks iOS compatibility for updates and installs 
â€¢ Asks you to install latest compatible version if not supported
â€¢ View unsupported updates from My Apps tab

Revamped Error Handling
â€¢ Completely revamped error handling to make debugging issues as easy as possible
â€¢ Revised error messages to be more descriptive and provide more suggestions
â€¢ Includes more information with errors

Misc.
â€¢ Pull-to-refresh to check for updates
â€¢ Supports new â€œversionsâ€ key in source JSON
â€¢Â Supports updating apps from app detail page

FIXED
â€¢ Fixed "more" button appearing by mistake on app detail pages
â€¢ Fixed widgets potentially not updating after refreshing apps
â€¢ Fixed incorrect app name and iOS version in "Unsupported iOS version" error message
â€¢ Fixed refreshing tweaked apps with removed app extensions
â€¢ Fixed incorrect error toast view color when sign-in fails

â€¢ Fixed error fetching Friend Zone patrons due to unexpected nil name
â€¢ Fixed incorrect cell height for some News items
apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This version of AltStore allows you to install Delta, an all-in-one emulator for iOS, as well as sideload other .ipa files from the Files app.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: AltStore uses the local network to find and communicate with AltServer.
